name: Pick Up Chicks
description:
Note: I might be able to add Web GL support in the future, but currently I had problems getting it working.

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move,

Space to pickup chicken, and space to put it down in the coop if you're standing on it.

and Escape to return to menu.

The chickens have gotten OUT OF CONTROL! Start with 15 seconds and pickup the chickens to get more time and more points! Get as many points as you can before timer runs out!

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w5GisyvQJ3Q
